description: We're an AI research company that builds reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems. Our first product is Claude, an AI assistant for tasks at any scale. Our research interests span multiple areas including natural language, human feedback, scaling laws, reinforcement learning, code generation, and interpretability.
Location: San Francisco, California, United States of America
Key AI features: Claude 3.5 Sonnet; AI safety; Interdisciplinary AI expertise; API for integration with Claude
Notable use cases: Driving efficiency with Claude; Creating new revenue streams using Claude

description: Fast, open-source and secure language models. Facilitated specialisation of models on business use-cases, leveraging private data and usage feedback. Built from a world-class team in Europe, targeting global market. Join the team ! https://jobs.lever.co/mistral/
Key AI features: Open-weight models for customization; Super-efficient models (Mistral Nemo); Multiple model licensing options (free non-commercial, commercial); Serverless APIs and public cloud services; Independence from cloud providers; Fine-tuning and modification capabilities; Top-tier reasoning in multiple languages; High availability, speed, and quality control
Notable use cases: Deployment in private environments; Commercial applications for businesses; Use by AI-first startups and large corporates; Decentralized technology development

description: AlphaSense is how the world’s most sophisticated companies remove uncertainty from their decision-making. With market intelligence and search built on proven AI, AlphaSense quickly delivers relevant insights from a trustworthy universe of public and private content—including equity research, company filings, event transcripts, expert calls, news, trade journals, and clients’ own research content. Headquartered in New York City, AlphaSense employs over 1,000 people across offices in the U.S., U.K., Finland, India, and Singapore. For more information, please visit www.alpha-sense.com.
Location: New York, United States of America
Key AI features: AI-fueled smart chat Assistant; Smart Synonyms™; GenAI-powered Smart Summaries; Customizable dashboards and alerts; Annotation, highlighting, and note-taking tools; Table tools for modeling and historical analysis; 3rd party connectors and APIs
Notable use cases: Benchmarking; Business Development; Competitive Intelligence; Due Diligence; Earnings Analysis; Fundamental Research; Market Landscaping; Private Market Intelligence

description: Figure is an AI Robotics company building the world's first commercially viable autonomous humanoid robot. We are based in Sunnyvale, CA.
